title: Critical: LSLib now requires .NET 8
description: A bug has been discovered when using the latest version of LSLib\Divine as it now requires [.NET Desktop Runtime 8](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet/thank-you/runtime-desktop-8.0.3-windows-x64-installer) to be installed before it can correctly read PAK files. Please close Vortex, install the runtime, restart computer and then open Vortex.
